upgrades.text: Replace up to two Rocket Launchers and CCWs
Any model may take one Carbine attachment
Replace any Carbine and Energy Claw
Any model may take one Carbine attachment
Replace Shock Rifle and Rocket Launcher

specialRules.name: Mad Doctor
specialRules.description: This model and his unit get the Regeneration special rule.

specialRules.name: Energy Field
specialRules.description: The hero and his unit get the Stealth special rule.

specialRules.name: Repair
specialRules.description: Once per turn, if within 2” of a unit with Tough, roll one die. On a 2+ you may repair 1 wound from the target.

specialRules.name: SHOOT!
specialRules.description: The hero and his unit get the Relentless special rule.

specialRules.name: WAR!
specialRules.description: The hero and his unit move +3” on advance and +6” on rush/charge actions.

specialRules.name: Red Paint Job
specialRules.description: This model moves +3” on Advance and +6” on Rush/Charge actions.

specialRules.name: Teleport
specialRules.description: When this model is activated it may teleport by up to 6” in any direction, ignoring all units and terrain.

spells.name: Warpath
spells.description: Target friendly unit within 12” gets Stealth next time it’s shot at.

spells.name: Crackling Bolt
spells.description: Target enemy unit within 6” must take a dangerous terrain test.

spells.name: Headbang
spells.description: Target friendly unit within 12” gets Rending in melee next time it fights.

spells.name: Death Bolt
spells.description: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 1 hit with AP(4) and Deadly(3).

spells.name: Teleport
spells.description: Target friendly unit within 12” may immediately move by up to 6”.

spells.name: Psychic Vomit
spells.description: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 4 automatic hits with AP(2).
